markdownRemark.html: Situated in the municipality of Manilva, in Malaga province. An extremely interesting course with many panoramic vantage points, some long par 4's for middle handicaps. But some very interesting par 3's. There is a relaxing atmosphere in the club house or on the terrace. Please remember to hire a buggy, it hot and it's undulating in the summer!

frontmatter.title: La Duquesa Golf & Country Club
